name: Sovereign Seeds & Starts
description: With the aid of native farmers and organizations across Indian Country, we aim to distribute not only high quality, youth grown and processed organic foods, seeds and starts to our community but to be teachers within our community of the stories, traditions and histories that come with every seed. At At Sovereign Seeds & Starts we place an emphasis on maintaining the genetic heritage of our seeds through teaching understanding of plant pollination, hybridization and traditional seed saving techn

howToGetIt: For more information contact: Ben Schleffar (510) 208-1870 x310 To sign up for the annual squash contest , please email your name, category and contact info to christian@aicrc.org
